name: Crossroads (Arthadanel)
description:
Basic controls:

WASD - move camera (can also hover mouse near edges of the screen)

LMB - (de)select your unit (you play as blue characters)

Use LMB to select actions that unit can perform from panel.

LMB on highlighted tile to confirm action and|or select action target.

Units can't use "Heal" on themselves.

Interact with "doors" after all enemies are dead to unlock new levels (before interaction you must select a unit that is located next to that door). You must exit levels manually.

You can change generation setup by editing generation seed in the settings.
